§ 101321. Service employee training The Secretary shall develop a comprehensive training program for employees in all professional careers in the workforce of the Service for the purpose of ensuring that the workforce has available the best up-to-date knowledge, skills, and abilities with which to manage, interpret, and protect the resources of the System. (Pub. L. 113–287, § 3, Dec. 19, 2014, 128 Stat. 3125.)
